column1: #Text=Well so , how to you maintain continuity and fluidity of the story across the pages ?
#Text=By being very diligent before I write it .
#Text=So if I 've , I am a big believer that you should outline everything .
#Text=So before I write the script I 've got it all planned out , I know which character 's gon na go where ; so that I do n't have to make it up and hope I can remember what 's all going to happen .
#Text=If I have got it all laid out , " okay , Issue #1 this happens .

column1: #Text=I would say , Vladimir Nabokov , James Joyce and Herman Melville . [ ... ]
#Text=They 're probably the writers who , essentially any writer who is angry , and argues a lot in their books , they are the ones I tend to like .
#Text=I think , okay , I think Eminem is probably my real , my real influence .
#Text=If you could travel back in time , what advice would you give to your younger self ?
#Text=" Stop partying so much , go home , and write .
